description:
Cocoa has moved into the new town where she`ll start attending high school in spring. She gets lost and enters a café called Rabbit House to ask for directions...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au premier regard, j’ai deviné qu’il était incroyablement moelleux
Hitome de, Jinjou de Nai Mofumofu Da to Minuita yo
I Knew at First Glance That It Was No Ordinary Fluffball
ひと目で, 尋常でないもふもふだと見抜いたよ
